results.title: Enhanced hype.
results.text_hl: The recently published Effect of Combination @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@Ezetimibe@@@ and High-Dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ vs. Simvastatin Alone on the Atherosclerotic Process in @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ With Heterozygous @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@Familial Hypercholesterolemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Enhanced_S_Cone_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564835 @@@ENHANCE@@@) trial seems to raise questions regarding the notion that @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ lowering is of benefit in the prevention and treatment of @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@vascular disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Harrison DG, Brown WV, Raggi P. Enhanced hype. Am J Cardiol. 2008 Aug 1;102(3):368-9. PMID: 18638604
